l:dependency.name: Git Parameter Plug-In
l:dependency.l:description: Assign git tag or revision number as parameter in Parametrized builds

l:dependency.name: Apache Commons Lang
l:dependency.l:description: Apache Commons Lang, a package of Java utility classes for the classes that are in java.lang's hierarchy, or are considered to be so standard as to justify existence in java.lang.

l:dependency.name: Pipeline: Step API
l:dependency.l:description: The Jenkins Plugins Parent POM Project

l:dependency.name: Joda-Time
l:dependency.l:description: Date and time library to replace JDK date handling
